etymons.meaning: beneiden; SL July 4 2019: ḥsd Marg 150 to revile, insult!

Preterit.text: ḥzelux b-i=xədm-ayḏe, xdəmle b-i=ʕito; hawo mḥasadle mene ʻyou have seen his service, [how] he served at the church; [therefore] that envied himʼ; 160; 40/17;
Zwәnli u+telefon ḥaṯo, mḥasdo I Ksenya mini ‘I bought a new phone and Ksusha was jealous of/envied me’ (Ilyas p.c.)
ḥəlle b-Žawhar w b-i=ʕaskar, mʕaǧəb w maḥsəd ʻer betrachtete Dschauhar und seine Soldaten, er bewunderte und beneidete ihn um sieʼ; 154; prs 110/7;

idioms: maḥsadle: ko maḥsadno u Sergey qarši d Gule – I make Gule envious of Sergey.
maḥsadli u Afrem  qarši d Gule (both examples are from Ilyas)
